channel.title: PyTorch on Karmotrine Dream
channel.description: Recent content in PyTorch on Karmotrine Dream

item.title: Pytorch: End of Agony
item.description: The agonizing days of building everything from scratch (NVIDIA driver, CUDA, cuDNN) is over. Don’t have to spend time on CUDA documentaion, or building Tensorflow：多版本部署、系统配置与版本切换. Now, use PyTorch, and you will be amazed at ease of building a GPU capable meachine learning model with neural network. The PyTorch binaries include the CUDA and cuDNN libraries. How to check if torch uses cuDNN
